description: JSON schema for all fields associated with a DOI.

id.description: The unique ID of this DOI stored in Synapse.

doiUri.description: The unique URI of this DOI to which the resource can be resolved. Contents of this field will be overwritten because it is determined by Synapse.

doiUrl.description: The DOI URL that will point to the Synapse object.  Contents of this field will be overwritten because it is determined by Synapse.

objectId.description: The ID of the digital object in Synapse for which this DOI is created.

objectType.description: The type of the digital object.

objectVersion.description: Optional. The version of the digital object. When null, the DOI is associated with the current version of the object.

associatedBy.description: The ID of the user that creates this DOI.

associatedOn.description: The date time this DOI is first created.

updatedBy.description: The ID of the user that last updated this DOI.

updatedOn.description: The date time this DOI is last updated.
